description: Upgrade the todo/protocol tracker into a full exercise management system with video library, daily reminders, streaks, and specialist appointment tracking.

userStories.title: Exercise library with categories
userStories.description: Create an exercise library (new Supabase table) with fields: name, category (stretching/strengthening/mobility/posture), target area (shoulders/spine/hips/core), instructions, difficulty, sets/reps/duration defaults. Seed with common scoliosis/posture exercises. UI to browse and add to protocol.

userStories.title: Daily protocol scheduling
userStories.description: Upgrade TodoTracker to support scheduling exercises on specific days (M/W/F, daily, custom). Show today's exercises prominently. Track completion with timestamps. Calculate daily/weekly compliance rate.

userStories.title: Streak tracking and gamification
userStories.description: Track consecutive days of completing all scheduled exercises. Show current streak, longest streak, total days active. Add visual streak calendar (GitHub-style contribution grid). Celebrate milestones.

userStories.title: Exercise video references
userStories.description: Allow attaching YouTube/video URLs to exercises in the library. Show embedded video player in exercise detail view. User can also upload their own form-check videos linked to specific exercises.

userStories.title: Specialist appointment tracker
userStories.description: Add an appointments table: date, specialist name, type (physio/chiro/ortho/massage), notes, follow-up date. Show upcoming appointments on dashboard. Track visit history and specialist recommendations.

userStories.title: Exercise logging with notes
userStories.description: When completing an exercise, allow adding notes (felt tight, pain level, modified form). Track exercise-specific metrics over time. Show per-exercise history and progression.
